title: Anniversary
description: It's an anniversary of when you met, got together, or another significant milestone in your relationship.
responses: Reflect on how far you've come

title: Personal Achievement
description: You accomplish something you've been working toward for a long time. The hard work paid off!
responses: Set your sights on the next goal

title: Moving In Together
description: You're taking the step to share a living space. Exciting and nerve-wracking in equal measure!
responses: Be patient with the adjustment period

title: Career Breakthrough
description: A major career advancement - promotion, new job, successful project launch. Your professional life levels up!
responses: Share the success with your partner

title: First Big Trip Together
description: Your first major trip as a couple. New places, new experiences, deeper connection.

title: Financial Milestone
description: You hit a financial goal - paid off debt, saved a target amount, made a smart investment. Financial freedom feels closer!

title: Creative Accomplishment
description: You complete a creative project you're proud of - writing, art, music, whatever feeds your soul.
responses: Share it with your partner and others
Start thinking about the next project

title: Overcoming a Fear
description: You face and overcome something that scared you. Personal courage unlocked!
responses: Share the experience with your partner
Consider what else you might tackle

title: Community Impact
description: You make a meaningful difference in your community through volunteering, activism, or helping others.
responses: Inspire your partner to join you

title: Learning Achievement
description: You master a new skill, complete a course, or reach a learning goal you set for yourself.
